summary.span: 表示应用程序域，它是一个应用程序在其中执行的独立环境。

span.span: Represents an application domain, which is an isolated environment where applications execute.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序域由 对象表示，有助于提供隔离、卸载和安全边界来执行托管代码。Application domains, which are represented by objects, help provide isolation, unloading, and security boundaries for executing managed code. - 使用应用程序域来隔离可能会关闭进程的任务。Use application domains to isolate tasks that might bring down a process. 如果执行任务的 的状态变得不稳定，则可以在不影响过程的情况下卸载 。If the state of the that's executing a task becomes unstable, the can be unloaded without affecting the process. 当进程必须长时间运行而不重新启动时，这非常重要。This is important when a process must run for long periods without restarting. 你还可以使用应用程序域来隔离不应共享数据的任务。You can also use application domains to isolate tasks that should not share data. - 如果将程序集加载到默认应用程序域中，则在进程运行时，不能从内存中卸载该程序集。If an assembly is loaded into the default application domain, it cannot be unloaded from memory while the process is running. 但是，如果打开第二个应用程序域来加载和执行程序集，则在卸载该应用程序域时将卸载该程序集。However, if you open a second application domain to load and execute the assembly, the assembly is unloaded when that application domain is unloaded. 使用此方法可以最大程度地减少偶尔使用大型 Dll 的长时间运行的进程的工作集。Use this technique to minimize the working set of long-running processes that occasionally use large DLLs. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Core 中， 实现受设计限制，不提供隔离、卸载或安全边界。On .NET Core, the implementation is limited by design and does not provide isolation, unloading, or security boundaries. 对于 .NET Core，只能有一个 。For .NET Core, there is exactly one . 通过 提供隔离和卸载。Isolation and unloading are provided through . 安全边界应由进程边界和适当的远程处理技术提供。Security boundaries should be provided by process boundaries and appropriate remoting techniques. 可在单个进程中运行多个应用程序域;但是，应用程序域和线程之间不会有一对一的相关性。Multiple application domains can run in a single process; however, there is not a one-to-one correlation between application domains and threads. 多个线程可以属于单个应用程序域，而给定线程并不局限于单个应用程序域，在任何给定时间，线程都在一个应用程序域中执行。Several threads can belong to a single application domain, and while a given thread is not confined to a single application domain, at any given time, a thread executes in a single application domain. 应用程序域是使用 方法创建的。Application domains are created using the method. 实例用于加载和执行程序集（）。 instances are used to load and execute assemblies (). 当不再使用 时，可以将其卸载。When an is no longer in use, it can be unloaded. 类实现了一组事件，使应用程序能够在加载程序集、卸载应用程序域或引发未经处理的异常时做出响应。The class implements a set of events that enable applications to respond when an assembly is loaded, when an application domain will be unloaded, or when an unhandled exception is thrown. 有关使用应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)。For more information on using application domains, see [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md). 此类实现 、和 接口。This class implements the , , and interfaces. 永远不应为 对象创建可远程包装。You should never create a remotable wrapper for an object. 这样做可能会发布对该 的远程引用，公开 的方法，以便远程访问和有效销毁该 的代码访问安全性。Doing so could publish a remote reference to that , exposing methods such as to remote access and effectively destroying code access security for that . 连接到远程 的恶意客户端可以获取对 本身有权访问的任何资源的访问权限。Malicious clients connecting to the remoted could obtain access to any resource the itself has access to. 不要为任何扩展 的类型创建可远程包装，并实现恶意客户端可用于绕过安全系统的方法。Do not create remotable wrappers for any type that extends and that implements methods that could be used by malicious clients to bypass the security system. > [!CAUTION] > 属性的默认值为 `false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 对于服务，此设置是不安全的。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建新的 ，在新 中实例化类型，并与该类型的对象进行通信。This example shows how to create a new , instantiate a type in that new , and communicate with that type's object. 此外，此示例还演示如何卸载导致对象被垃圾回收的 。In addition, this example shows how to unload the causing the object to be garbage collected. [!code-cpp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cpp/AppDomainX.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cs/AppDomainX.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/VB/AppDomainX.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在加载程序集时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an assembly is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的 委托指示加载的程序集。The delegate for this event indicates what assembly was loaded. 若要为此事件注册事件处理程序，你必须具有所需的权限，或者引发 。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CPP/assemblyload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CS/assemblyload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/VB/assemblyload.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在对程序集的解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的 负责返回由 属性指定的程序集，如果该程序集无法识别，则返回 null。It is the responsibility of the for this event to return the assembly that is specified by the property, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. 必须将程序集加载到执行上下文中;如果将其加载到仅反射上下文中，导致引发此事件的负载会失败。The assembly must be loaded into an execution context; if it is loaded into the reflection-only context, the load that caused this event to be raised fails. 有关使用此事件的指导，请参阅[解决程序集加载](~/docs/standard/assembly/resolve-loads.md)。For guidance on the use of this event, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/standard/assembly/resolve-loads.md). 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始， 属性返回请求未能解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 例如，加载程序可能无法加载请求程序集的依赖项，因为请求的程序集及其依赖项不在探测路径中。For example, the loader might be unable to load a dependency of the requesting assembly because the requesting assembly and its dependency are not in the probing path. 如果提供了多个版本的依赖项，则知道请求程序集的标识可能对查找依赖项或标识正确的版本很有用。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in locating the dependency or in identifying the correct version, if more than one version of the dependency is available. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]开始，为所有程序集（包括资源程序集）引发 事件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. 在早期版本中，资源程序集不引发事件。In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. 如果对操作系统进行了本地化，则可以多次调用处理程序：对回退链中的每个区域性调用一次。If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. 对于此事件， 属性在应用策略之前返回程序集名称。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果为此事件注册了多个事件处理程序，则将按顺序调用事件处理程序，直到某个事件处理程序返回一个不 `null`的值。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlers are called in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 后续事件处理程序将被忽略。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CPP/assemblyresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CS/assemblyresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/VB/assemblyresolve.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载使用默认应用程序域中的 信息。This method overload uses the information from the default application domain. 如果未提供 `securityInfo`，则使用当前应用程序域中的证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用此方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，为 `securityInfo` 提供的证据不再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用 方法重载创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用 重载之一来创建域。The following sample demonstrates, in general, how to create a domain using one of the overloads. summary.span: 使用证据、应用程序基路径、相对搜索路径和指定是否向应用程序域中加载程序集的影像副本的形参创建具有给定名称的新应用程序域。

span.span: Creates a new application domain with the given name, using evidence, application base path, relative search path, and a parameter that specifies whether a shadow copy of an assembly is to be loaded into the application domain.

summary.span: 指定在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法，以及传递回调方法的字符串实参数组。

span.span: Specifies a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized, and an array of string arguments to pass the callback method.

returns.span: 新创建的应用程序域。

span.span: The newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `adInit` 所表示的方法在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行。The method represented by `adInit` is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. 如果未提供 `securityInfo`，则使用当前应用程序域中的证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅 和[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information about shadow copying, see and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用此方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，为 `securityInfo` 提供的证据不再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用 方法重载创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为 `typeName`调用无参数的构造函数。This method calls the parameterless constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅 `assemblyName`格式 。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试对不是当前应用程序域的目标应用程序域调用 将导致成功地在目标应用程序域中加载程序集。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于未 ，因此当此方法尝试将已加载程序集的 返回到当前应用程序域时，公共语言运行时将尝试将程序集加载到当前应用程序域中，并且加载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 如果两个应用程序域的路径设置不同，则加载到当前应用程序域中的程序集可能不同于首先加载的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 `assemblyName`格式 。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试对不是当前应用程序域的目标应用程序域调用 将导致成功地在目标应用程序域中加载程序集。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于未 ，因此当此方法尝试将已加载程序集的 返回到当前应用程序域时，公共语言运行时将尝试将程序集加载到当前应用程序域中，并且加载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 如果两个应用程序域的路径设置不同，则加载到当前应用程序域中的程序集可能不同于首先加载的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一种将 和 结合起来的便利方法。This is a convenience method that combines and . 此方法为 `typeName`调用无参数的构造函数。This method calls the parameterless constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅 `assemblyName`格式 。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅 `typeName`格式的 属性。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果对 返回的类型 `T1` 对象的 `M` 的方法进行早期绑定调用，并且该方法对程序集中的类型 `T2` 的对象的方法进行早期绑定调用，则会将程序集 `C` 加载到当前程序集或包含 `T1`的程序集。`C`If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使对 `T1.M()` 进行早期绑定调用是在 体或其他动态生成的代码中进行的，也会发生此加载。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域为默认域，则在进程结束之前，不能卸载程序集 `C`。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域稍后尝试加载 `C`的程序集，则加载可能会失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在其他应用程序域中执行代码的最简单方法。The following code example shows the simplest way to execute code in another application domain. 该示例定义了从 继承的名为 `Worker` 的类。The example defines a class named `Worker` that inherits from . `Worker` 类定义一个方法，该方法显示执行该应用程序的应用程序域的名称。The `Worker` class defines a method that displays the name of the application domain in which it is executing. 该示例在默认应用程序域和新的应用程序域中创建 `Worker` 的实例。The example creates instances of `Worker` in the default application domain and in a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 包含 `Worker` 的程序集必须加载到这两个应用程序域中，但它可以加载仅存在于新应用程序域中的其他程序集。The assembly that contains `Worker` must be loaded into both application domains, but it can load other assemblies that exist only in the new application domain. [!code-cpp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一种将 和 结合起来的便利方法。This is a convenience method that combines and . 请参阅 `assemblyName`格式 。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅 `typeName`格式的 属性。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果对 返回的类型 `T1` 对象的 `M` 的方法进行早期绑定调用，并且该方法对程序集中的类型 `T2` 的对象的方法进行早期绑定调用，则会将程序集 `C` 加载到当前程序集或包含 `T1`的程序集。`C`If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使对 `T1.M()` 进行早期绑定调用是在 体或其他动态生成的代码中进行的，也会发生此加载。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域为默认域，则在进程结束之前，不能卸载程序集 `C`。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域稍后尝试加载 `C`的程序集，则加载可能会失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `ignoreCase` 参数。The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CPP/ignorecase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CS/ignorecase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/VB/ignorecase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 `typeName` 的无参数构造函数。The parameterless constructor for `typeName` is invoked. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 如果使用 方法来创建目标应用程序域中的实例，而不是调用的应用程序域，则会在目标应用程序域中加载该程序集。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果实例在调用应用程序域中解包，则以特定方式使用已解包的实例可能会导致程序集加载到调用应用程序域中。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，在实例解包后，可能会请求其类型信息，以便以后调用其方法。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 将程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，可能会出现异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果以前将同一程序集的另一个版本加载到调用应用程序域中，或调用应用程序域的加载路径不同于目标应用程序域的加载路径，则可能会发生诸如 的异常。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域对实例类型进行早期绑定调用，则当尝试强制转换实例时，可能会引发 。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法重载在目标应用程序域中创建对象的实例并调用其方法。The following example shows how to use the method overload to create an instance of an object in a target application domain and call its methods. 该示例定义了可跨应用程序域边界进行封送的 `MarshalableExample` 类。The example defines the `MarshalableExample` class, which can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 该示例生成当前正在执行的程序集的路径，创建目标应用程序域，并使用 方法重载将示例程序集加载到目标应用程序域中，并创建 `MarshalableExample`的实例。The example builds a path to the currently executing assembly, creates a target application domain, and uses the method overload to load the example assembly into the target application domain and create an instance of `MarshalableExample`. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中，路径是绝对路径，但相对路径也会起作用，因为 方法用于加载程序集。The path is absolute in this example, but a relative path would also work because the method is used to load the assembly. 解包对象句柄之后，该示例演示了在目标应用程序域中使用对象的三种方法：After unwrapping the object handle, the example demonstrates three ways to use an object in a target application domain: - 使用反射通过后期绑定调用方法。Invoking a method with late binding, using reflection. 这需要类型信息，这会导致程序集加载到调用方的应用程序域中。This requires type information, which causes the assembly to be loaded into the application domain of the caller. （在此示例中，它已加载。）(In this example, it is already loaded.) - 将对象强制转换为调用方和被调用方都已知的接口。Casting the object to an interface known to both the caller and the callee. 如果接口是在调用程序集或调用方和被调用方引用的第三个程序集中定义的，则调用的程序集不会加载到调用方的应用程序域中。If the interface is defined in the calling assembly or in a third assembly referenced by both the caller and the callee, the called assembly is not loaded into the application domain of the caller. - 当调用方知道对象的类型时，直接使用对象。Using the object directly when its type is known to the caller. 必须将程序集加载到调用方的应用程序域中。The assembly must be loaded into the application domain of the caller. 避免将调用的程序集加载到调用方的应用程序域中的另一种方法是，调用方派生自 类，并定义可在目标应用程序域中运行的方法。Another way to avoid loading the called assembly into the application domain of the caller is for the caller to derive from the class and to define a method that can be run in the target application domain. 该方法可以使用反射来检查目标程序集，因为目标程序集已加载到目标应用程序域中。That method can use reflection to examine a target assembly, because the target assembly is already loaded into the target application domain. 请参阅 属性的示例。See the example for the property. [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 如果使用 方法来创建目标应用程序域中的实例，而不是调用的应用程序域，则会在目标应用程序域中加载该程序集。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果实例在调用应用程序域中解包，则以特定方式使用已解包的实例可能会导致程序集加载到调用应用程序域中。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，在实例解包后，可能会请求其类型信息，以便以后调用其方法。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 将程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，可能会出现异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果以前将同一程序集的另一个版本加载到调用应用程序域中，或调用应用程序域的加载路径不同于目标应用程序域的加载路径，则可能会发生诸如 的异常。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域对实例类型进行早期绑定调用，则当尝试强制转换实例时，可能会引发 。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发用于发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和权限，提供希望动态程序集具有的证据，并在 `refusedPermissions`中包含 。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载指定在创建动态程序集时不能正常运行的属性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，如果在创建动态程序集之后添加了安全属性（例如 和 ），则这些属性不能正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload. 此方法重载在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]中引入。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有 的动态程序集。The following code sample shows how to create a dynamic assembly that has the . 特性必须指定为 对象的数组的元素。The attribute must be specified as an element of an array of objects. 创建 的第一步是获取该属性的构造函数。The first step in creating the is to obtain a constructor for the attribute. 构造函数没有任何参数，因此使用 对象的空数组调用 方法，以表示参数的类型。The constructor has no parameters, so the method is called with an empty array of objects to represent the types of the parameters. 第二步是将生成的 对象传递到 类的构造函数，以及类型 的空数组来表示参数。The second step is to pass the resulting object to the constructor for the class, together with an empty array of type to represent the arguments. 然后，生成的 将作为数组的唯一元素传递到 方法。The resulting is then passed to the method as the only element of an array. 示例代码在新的动态程序集中定义一个模块和一个类型，然后显示该程序集的属性。The example code defines a module and a type in the new dynamic assembly, and then displays the assembly's attributes. [!code-cpp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义动态 时，仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供其 `evidence`。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 运行时将通过安全策略映射 来确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供空 `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果 `null``evidence`，则运行时将从调用方的 向定义的动态 复制权限集，即当前 grant 和 deny 集，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态 保存到磁盘，则后续加载将根据与保存 的位置相关联的策略获得授权。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发用于发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和权限，提供希望动态程序集具有的证据，并在 `refusedPermissions`中包含 。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and the event. 首先，该代码示例通过调用具有无效程序集名称的 方法来尝试创建 `MyDynamicType` 实例，并捕获产生的异常。First, the code example tries to create an instance of `MyDynamicType` by calling the method with an invalid assembly name, and catches the resulting exception. 然后，该代码示例为 事件添加事件处理程序，并再次尝试创建`MyDynamicType`的实例。The code example then adds an event handler for the event, and again tries to create an instance of`MyDynamicType`. 在调用 期间，将为无效程序集引发 事件。During the call to , the event is raised for the invalid assembly. 该事件处理程序创建一个包含名为 `MyDynamicType`的类型的动态程序集，为该类型提供一个无参数的构造函数，并返回新的动态程序集。The event handler creates a dynamic assembly that contains a type named `MyDynamicType`, gives the type a parameterless constructor, and returns the new dynamic assembly. 然后调用 成功完成，并且 `MyDynamicType` 的构造函数在控制台显示一条消息。The call to then finishes successfully, and the constructor for `MyDynamicType` displays a message at the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载指定在创建动态程序集时不能正常运行的属性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，如果在创建动态程序集之后添加了安全属性（例如 和 ），则这些属性不能正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非动态程序集已保存并重新加载到内存中，否则不会使用为 `requiredPermissions`、`optionalPermissions`和 `refusedPermissions` 指定的权限请求。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要为从不保存到磁盘的临时程序集指定权限请求，请使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和请求的权限，并提供 对象。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在开发用于发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和权限，提供希望动态程序集具有的证据，并在 `refusedPermissions`中包含 。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information, see the method overload . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载指定在创建动态程序集时不能正常运行的属性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，如果在创建动态程序集之后添加了安全属性（例如 和 ），则这些属性不能正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 如果 `true``isSynchronized`，则生成的 的以下方法将同步： 、、、、和 。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用了这两个方法，则将阻止一个方法，直到另一个线程完成。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed.

param.name: name
param.span: 动态程序集的唯一标识。

span.span: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.

param.name: access
param.span: 访问动态程序集所采用的模式。

param.name: evidence
param.span: 为动态程序集提供的证据。

param.span: 该证据始终作为最后一组用于策略解析的证据来使用。

span.span: The evidence is used unaltered as the final set of evidence used for policy resolution.

param.name: requiredPermissions
param.span: 必需的权限请求。

span.span: The required permissions request.

param.name: optionalPermissions
param.span: 可选的权限请求。

span.span: The optional permissions request.

summary.span: 使用指定名称、访问模式、证据和权限请求定义动态程序集。

span.span: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, evidence, and permission requests.

returns.span: 具有指定名称和功能的动态程序集。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当同时提供 `evidence` 时，或者如果动态程序集已保存并重新加载到内存中时，才使用为 `requiredPermissions`、`optionalPermissions`和 `refusedPermissions` 指定的权限请求。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议您将 包含在 `refusedPermissions`中。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 定义动态 时，仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供其 `evidence`。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 运行时将通过安全策略映射 来确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供空 `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果 `null``evidence`，则运行时将从调用方的 向定义的动态 复制权限集，即当前 grant 和 deny 集，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态 保存到磁盘，则后续加载将根据与保存 的位置相关联的策略获得授权。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非动态程序集已保存并重新加载到内存中，否则不会使用为 `requiredPermissions`、`optionalPermissions`和 `refusedPermissions` 指定的权限请求。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要为从不保存到磁盘的临时程序集指定权限请求，请使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和请求的权限，并提供 对象。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在开发用于发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议使用 方法的重载，该重载指定证据和权限，提供希望动态程序集具有的证据，并在 `refusedPermissions`中包含 。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 此方法应仅用于在当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当同时提供 `evidence` 时，或者如果动态程序集已保存并重新加载到内存中时，才使用为 `requiredPermissions`、`optionalPermissions`和 `refusedPermissions` 指定的权限请求。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发发出动态程序集的代码的过程中，建议您将 包含在 `refusedPermissions`中。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中包括 可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发 。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 定义动态 时，仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供其证据。Only fully trusted callers can supply their evidence when defining a dynamic . 运行时将通过安全策略映射 来确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须为 `evidence` 参数提供 `null`。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果 `null``evidence`，则运行时将从调用方的 向定义的动态 复制权限集，即当前 grant 和 deny 集，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态 保存到磁盘，则后续加载将根据与保存 的位置相关联的策略获得授权。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 如果 `true``isSynchronized`，则生成的 的以下方法将同步： 、、、、和 。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用了这两种方法，则会阻止一个方法，直到另一个线程完成。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other completes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法和 事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载指定在创建动态程序集时不能正常运行的属性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，如果在创建动态程序集之后添加了安全属性（例如 和 ），则这些属性不能正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 仅当同时提供 `evidence` 参数时，或者如果动态程序集已保存并重新加载到内存中时，才使用为 `requiredPermissions`、`optionalPermissions`和 `refusedPermissions` 参数指定的权限请求。The permission requests specified for the `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` parameters are used only if the `evidence` parameter is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 开发用于发出动态程序集的代码时，我们建议您将 标志包含在 `refusedPermissions` 参数中。When you develop code that emits dynamic assemblies, we recommend that you include the flag in the `refusedPermissions` parameter. 此标志的包含确保将验证 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）。The inclusion of this flag ensures that the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) will be verified. 此方法将检测意外生成的不可验证代码，否则很难检测到这种情况。This technique will detect the unintentional generation of unverifiable code, which otherwise is very difficult to detect. 此方法的限制是，它还会导致 在与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when it is used with code that demands full trust. 定义动态 时，仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供证据。Only fully trusted callers can supply evidence when defining a dynamic . 运行时通过安全策略将 映射，以确定授予的权限。The runtime maps the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须为 `evidence` 参数提供 `null`。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果 `null``evidence`，则运行时将权限集（即，当前 grant 和 deny 集）从调用方的程序集复制到正在定义的动态程序集，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets (that is, the current grant and deny sets) from the caller's assembly to the dynamic assembly that is being defined, and marks the policy as resolved. 如果动态程序集保存到磁盘，则后续的加载将根据与动态程序集保存位置相关联的策略获得授予。If the dynamic assembly is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies that are associated with the location where the dynamic assembly was saved. 如果 `true``isSynchronized`，则生成的 的以下方法将同步： 、、、、和 。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用了这两个方法，则将阻止一个方法，直到另一个线程完成。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed. 此方法重载在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]中引入。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时（CLR）的非托管主机可以提供域管理器。An unmanaged host of the common language runtime (CLR) can provide a domain manager. 域管理器可以参与初始化新应用程序域并提供参与应用程序域操作的其他管理器，例如 。The domain manager can participate in initializing the new application domain and supply other managers, such as a , that participate in the operations of the application domain.

summary.span: 在即将卸载 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的 委托可以在卸载应用程序域之前执行任何终止活动。The delegate for this event can perform any termination activities before the application domain is unloaded. 需要在卸载时执行处理的每个应用程序域都应为此事件注册事件处理程序。Each application domain that needs to perform processing when it is unloaded should register an event handler for this event. 不应使用共享事件处理程序，因为 委托不标识正在卸载的域。A shared event handler should not be used, because the delegate does not identify the domain that is being unloaded. > [!NOTE] > 此事件永远不会在默认应用程序域中引发。This event is never raised in the default application domain. 不要对引发事件的线程做出假设。Do not make assumptions about the thread the event is raised on. 事件可以在不同于调用 方法的线程上引发。The event can be raised on a different thread than the one that called the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取目录，它由程序集冲突解决程序用来探测动态创建的程序集。

span.span: Gets the directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

value.span: 目录，它由程序集冲突解决程序用来探测动态创建的程序集。

span.span: The directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置动态目录，请为将用于创建新应用程序域的 对象的 属性分配基目录路径。To set the dynamic directory, assign a base directory path to the property of the object that will be used to create the new application domain. 通过添加一个子目录（其简单名称是分配给 属性的字符串的哈希代码）来修改分配给该属性的基目录路径，因此基目录的格式是\\*哈希代码*的*原始路径*。The base directory path you assign to the property is modified by the addition of a subdirectory whose simple name is the hash code of the string you assign to the property, so the format of the base directory is *original path*\\*hash code*. 动态目录是此基目录的子目录。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of this base directory. 它的简单名称是 属性的值，因此其格式是\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序名称*的*原始路径*。Its simple name is the value of the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个应用程序域，其中包含动态程序集的目录、发出动态程序集并将其存储在动态目录中，然后将程序集加载到新应用程序域中并使用该程序集。The following example creates an application domain with a directory for dynamic assemblies, emits a dynamic assembly and stores it in the dynamic directory, and then loads the assembly into the new application domain and uses it. 该示例创建一个 对象，并将其 属性设置为 "Example"，并将其 属性设置为 "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 然后，该示例显示 "" 属性，以显示已将应用程序名称的哈希代码附加为最初分配的路径的子目录。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 本示例中的基目录应位于示例应用程序的探测路径之外。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 请确保在其他位置编译该示例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 每次运行该示例时，删除基目录及其所有子目录。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 该示例使用 对象创建一个新的应用程序域。The example creates a new application domain, using the object. 该示例使用 属性检索目录的名称，因此它可以创建目录。The example uses the property to retrieve the name of the directory, so it can create the directory. （该示例通过连接原始路径、应用程序名称的哈希代码和应用程序名称，可以轻松地轻松创建目录。）(The example could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.) 该示例有一个 `GenerateDynamicAssembly` 方法，该方法发出名为 `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` 的程序集，并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录中。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 动态程序集包含一个类型 `HelloWorld`，该类型具有一个名为 `HelloFromAD`的静态方法（在 Visual Basic 中为`Shared` 方法）。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 调用此方法将显示应用程序域的名称。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example` 类派生自 ，因此该示例可以在新应用程序域中创建类的实例并调用其 `Test` 方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test` 方法按动态程序集的显示名称加载该程序集，并调用静态的 `HelloFromAD` 方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 通过编写名为 `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` 的程序集的代码并将其编译到与此示例相同的目录中，可以显示在正常探测路径之后搜索动态目录。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 该程序集必须具有一个名为 `HelloWorld` 的类，该类具有名为 `HelloFromAD`的静态方法。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 此方法不必与示例中的相同。它可以直接在控制台上显示字符串。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 该程序集还必须有一个将其版本设置为1.0.0.0 的 特性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 运行此示例时，将在搜索动态目录之前找到当前目录中编译的程序集。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException
Public Custom Event FirstChanceException As EventHandler(Of FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Runtime::ExceptionServices::FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ^> ^ FirstChanceException;
member this.FirstChanceException : EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs>

summary.span: 当托管代码抛出异常时发生，在运行时在调用堆栈中搜索应用程序域中的异常处理程序之前。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown in managed code, before the runtime searches the call stack for an exception handler in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件只是一个通知。This event is only a notification. 处理此事件不会处理异常，也不会影响后续的异常处理。Handling this event does not handle the exception or affect subsequent exception handling in any way. 引发事件并调用事件处理程序后，公共语言运行时（CLR）开始搜索异常的处理程序。After the event has been raised and event handlers have been invoked, the common language runtime (CLR) begins to search for a handler for the exception. 提供了应用程序域，并具有检查任何托管异常的第一次机会。 provides the application domain with a first chance to examine any managed exception. 可以按应用程序域处理事件。The event can be handled per application domain. 如果线程在执行调用时传递到多个应用程序域，则会在已注册事件处理程序的每个应用程序域中引发事件，然后 CLR 开始在该应用程序域中搜索匹配的异常处理程序。If a thread passes through multiple application domains while executing a call, the event is raised in each application domain that has registered an event handler, before the CLR begins searching for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 处理事件后，会在该应用程序域中搜索匹配的异常处理程序。After the event has been handled, a search is made for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 如果未找到任何内容，则会在下一个应用程序域中引发事件。If none is found, the event is raised in the next application domain. 您必须处理 事件的事件处理程序中发生的所有异常。You must handle all exceptions that occur in the event handler for the event. 否则，将以递归方式引发 。Otherwise, is raised recursively. 这可能导致堆栈溢出和终止应用程序。This could result in a stack overflow and termination of the application. 我们建议你将此事件的事件处理程序实现为受约束的执行区域（Cer），以将与基础结构相关的异常（如内存不足或堆栈溢出）与影响虚拟机有关，同时引发异常通知正在处理。We recommend that you implement event handlers for this event as constrained execution regions (CERs), to keep infrastructure-related exceptions such as out-of-memory or stack overflow from affecting the virtual machine while the exception notification is being processed. 对于指示进程状态损坏（如访问冲突）的异常，不会引发此事件，除非事件处理程序是安全关键的并且具有 特性。This event is not raised for exceptions that indicate corruption of process state, such as access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 当处理此通知事件时，公共语言运行时挂起线程中止。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while this notification event is being handled. ## Examples 下面的示例通过 `AD3`创建一系列名为 `AD0` 的应用程序域，并在每个应用程序域中创建一个 `Worker` 对象。The following example creates a series of application domains named `AD0` through `AD3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每个 `Worker` 对象都有一个对下一个应用程序域中 `Worker` 对象的引用，但最后一个应用程序域中的 `Worker` 除外。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 事件在除 `AD1`之外的所有应用程序域中进行处理。The event is handled in all application domains except `AD1`. > [!NOTE] > 除了在多个应用程序域中演示第一次异常通知的示例外，你可以在[如何：接收首次异常通知](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md)中找到简单的用例。In addition to this example, which demonstrates first-chance exception notifications in multiple application domains, you can find simple use cases in [How to: Receive First-Chance Exception Notifications](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md). 创建应用程序域后，默认应用程序域将为第一个应用程序域调用 `TestException` 方法。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first application domain. 每个 `Worker` 对象将调用下一个应用程序域的 `TestException` 方法，直到最后一个 `Worker` 引发处理或未处理的异常。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next application domain, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此，当前线程通过所有应用程序域，并将 `TestException` 添加到每个应用程序域中的堆栈中。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 当最后一个 `Worker` 对象处理异常时，只会在最后一个应用程序域中引发 事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他应用程序域绝不会有机会处理异常，因此不会引发事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 当最后一个 `Worker` 对象未处理异常时，将在具有事件处理程序的每个应用程序域中引发 事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每个事件处理程序完成后，堆栈将继续展开，直到默认应用程序域捕获到该异常。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看随着事件更近且更接近默认应用程序域，堆栈显示的增长方式，请将 `e.Exception.Message` 更改为 `FirstChanceHandler` 事件处理程序中的 `e.Exception`。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 请注意，当跨应用程序域边界调用 `TestException` 时，它会出现两次：一次用于代理，一次用于存根。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认应用程序域的友好名称是进程可执行文件的文件名。The friendly name of the default application domain is the file name of the process executable. 例如，如果用于启动进程的可执行文件是 `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`的，则会 `"MyAssembly.exe"`默认应用程序域的友好名称。For example, if the executable used to start the process is `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`, the friendly name of the default application domain is `"MyAssembly.exe"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性获取当前应用程序域的友好名称。The following code example uses the property to get the friendly name of the current application domain. 对于默认应用程序域，友好名称是应用程序的可执行文件的名称。For the default application domain, the friendly name is the name of the application's executable file. 此代码示例还显示了有关应用程序域的其他信息。The code example also displays additional information about the application domain. remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此方法检索名称数据对的内部缓存中的项的值，这些名称数据对描述 的此实例的属性。Use this method to retrieve the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 请注意，与键值对的名称比较 `name` 区分大小写。Note that the comparison of `name` with the name of key-value pairs is case-sensitive. 缓存自动包含创建应用程序域时插入的预定义系统条目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 可以通过 方法或等效 属性检查其值。You can inspect their values with the method, or the equivalent properties. 可以用 方法插入或修改自己的用户定义的名称数据对，并通过 方法检查其值。You can insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with the method and inspect their values with the method. 下表描述了每个预定义的系统项及其相应 属性的 `name`。The following table describes the `name` of each predefined system entry and its corresponding property. |"Name" 的值Value of 'name'|PropertyProperty| |---------------------|--------------| |APPBASE"APPBASE"|| |"APP_CONFIG_FILE""APP_CONFIG_FILE"|| |"APP_LAUNCH_URL""APP_LAUNCH_URL"|（无属性）(no property)

"APP_LAUNCH_URL" 表示在进行任何重定向之前用户最初请求的 URL。"APP_LAUNCH_URL" represents the URL originally requested by the user, before any redirection. 仅当使用浏览器（如 Internet Explorer）启动应用程序时，此功能才可用。It is available only when the application has been launched with a browser such as Internet Explorer. 并非所有浏览器都提供此值。Not all browsers provide this value.| |"APP_NAME""APP_NAME"|| |"BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY""BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY"|| |"CACHE_BASE""CACHE_BASE"|| |"CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED""CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED"|| |"DEV_PATH""DEV_PATH"|（无属性）(no property)| |"DISALLOW_APP""DISALLOW_APP"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING""DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS""DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS"|| |"DYNAMIC_BASE""DYNAMIC_BASE"|| |"FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL""FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL"|| |"LICENSE_FILE" 或特定于应用程序的字符串"LICENSE_FILE", or an application-specific string|| |"LOADER_OPTIMIZATION""LOADER_OPTIMIZATION"|| |"LOCATION_URI""LOCATION_URI"|（无属性）(no property)| |"PRIVATE_BINPATH""PRIVATE_BINPATH"|| |"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT""REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"|

"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" 不是系统项，可以通过调用 方法来设置其值。"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" is not a system entry, and its value can be set by calling the method.| |"SHADOW_COPY_DIRS""SHADOW_COPY_DIRS"|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的应用程序域，为域设置系统提供的值，并为该域添加一个新的值对。The following example creates a new application domain, sets a system-provided value for the domain, and adds a new value pair for the domain. 然后，该示例演示如何使用 方法检索这些值对中的数据，并将其显示在控制台中。The example then demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve the data from these value pairs and display them to the console. [!code-cpp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CPP/adgetdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CS/adgetdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/VB/adgetdata.vb#1)]

param.span: 要测试的兼容性开关。

span.span: The compatibility switch to test.

summary.span: 获取可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指示是否设置了任何兼容性开关，如果已设置，则指定是否设置了指定的兼容性开关。

span.span: Gets a nullable Boolean value that indicates whether any compatibility switches are set, and if so, whether the specified compatibility switch is set.

returns.span: 如果未设置任何兼容性开关，则为 null 引用（Visual Basic 中的 ）；否则，为布尔值，指示是否设置了由 指定的兼容性开关。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) if no compatibility switches are set; otherwise, a Boolean value that indicates whether the compatibility switch that is specified by is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试是否已为当前应用程序域设置了指定的兼容性开关。This method tests whether the specified compatibility switch has been set for the current application domain. 兼容性开关通常会还原在不同版本的 .NET Framework 之间发生更改的行为（例如字符串排序方式）。Compatibility switches typically restore a behavior (such as the way strings are sorted) that was changed between versions of the .NET Framework. 它们是在创建应用程序域之前通过调用 方法设置的。They are set by calling the method before creating an application domain. 下表提供了可设置为还原 .NET Framework 早期版本的行为的兼容性开关的示例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |开关Switch|含义Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 的代码访问安全性（CAS）。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 的字符串排序默认值。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 它的成功要求安装 sort00001000.dll。Its success requires sort00001000.dll to be installed. 请参阅[<CompatSortNLSVersion> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和 Unicode 5.0 的字符串排序默认值。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 它的成功要求安装 sort00060101。Its success requires sort00060101.dll to be installed.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 格式设置行为。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅 主题[<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和 "还原旧的 TimeSpan 格式" 部分。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|运行时基于每个应用程序域计算字符串的哈希代码，而不是使用单个哈希算法跨应用程序域生成一致的哈希代码。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 请参阅[<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

[!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CPP/System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/VB/source.vb#1)]

member this.IsFinalizingForUnload : unit -> bool

summary.span: 指示此应用程序域是否正在卸载以及公共语言运行时是否正在终止该域包含的对象。

span.span: Indicates whether this application domain is unloading, and the objects it contains are being finalized by the common language runtime.

returns.span: 如果此应用程序域正在卸载，并且公共语言运行时已开始调用终止程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this application domain is unloading and the common language runtime has started invoking finalizers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的终止方法使您能够在垃圾回收对象之前执行任何必要的清理操作。The finalization method for an object provides you an opportunity to perform any necessary cleanup operations before the object is garbage collected. 完成后，对象可访问但处于无效状态，因此无法使用。After finalization, the object is accessible but in an invalid state and therefore unusable. 最终，垃圾回收完成并回收对象。Eventually, garbage collection completes and reclaims the object. 对象的终止方法是在以下情况之一中调用的：在垃圾回收过程中，当公共语言运行时关闭时，或者当卸载包含对象的应用程序域时。An object's finalization method is called in one of the following situations: during garbage collection, when the common language runtime is shutting down, or when the application domain that contains the object is unloaded. 方法仅返回在最后一种情况下 `true`;如果从例程垃圾回收或 CLR 关闭终止结果，它不会返回 `true`。The method returns `true` only in the last case; it does not return `true` if finalization results from routine garbage collection or from CLR shutdown. > [!NOTE] > 若要确定完成是否是由于 CLR 关闭引起的，请使用 属性。To determine whether finalization is due to CLR shutdown, use the property. 如果终止是由于正在卸载的应用程序域或 CLR 正在关闭，则返回 `true`。It returns `true` if finalization is due to an application domain being unloaded or to the CLR shutting down. 在域卸载过程中，在你的完成方法中执行时，你可能想要访问由静态字段引用的另一个对象并具有一个终止方法。While executing in your finalization method during domain unloading, you might want to access another object that is referenced by a static field and has a finalization method. 但是，您不能可靠地这样做，因为访问的对象可能已经完成。However, you cannot reliably do so because the accessed object might already have been finalized. > [!NOTE] > 此规则的例外情况是 类，该类包含引用流对象的静态字段，但它是专门实现的，因此即使在域卸载或系统关闭期间，你也可以始终写入系统控制台。An exception to this rule is the class, which contains static fields that reference stream objects, but is implemented specially so you can always write to the system console, even during domain unloading or system shutdown. 在对象的终止方法中使用此方法可确定包含该对象的应用程序域是否正在卸载。Use this method in an object's finalization method to determine whether the application domain that contains the object is unloading. 如果是这种情况，则无法可靠地访问任何具有终止方法并且由静态字段引用的对象。If that is the case, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and is referenced by a static field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法始终为在桌面上运行的应用程序的默认应用程序域返回 `true`。This method always returns `true` for the default application domain of an application that runs on the desktop. 它为使用 方法重载创建的沙盒应用程序域返回 `false`，除非授予该应用程序域的权限等效于完全信任。It returns `false` for a sandboxed application domain that was created by using the method overload, unless the permissions that are granted to the application domain are equivalent to full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了具有完全信任和部分信任的应用程序域的 属性和 属性。The following example demonstrates the property and the property with fully trusted and partially trusted application domains. 完全受信任的应用程序域是应用程序的默认应用程序域。The fully trusted application domain is the default application domain for the application. 部分受信任的应用程序域是使用 方法重载创建的。The partially trusted application domain is created by using the method overload. 该示例使用派生自 的 `Worker` 类，因此可跨应用程序域边界进行封送处理。The example uses a `Worker` class that derives from , so it can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 该示例在默认应用程序域中创建一个 `Worker` 对象。The example creates a `Worker` object in the default application domain. 然后，它调用 `TestIsFullyTrusted` 方法来显示应用程序域的属性值，以及加载到应用程序域中的两个程序集的属性值： mscorlib，这是 .NET Framework 的一部分，以及示例程序集。It then calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method to display the property value for the application domain and for two assemblies that are loaded into the application domain: mscorlib, which is part of the .NET Framework, and the example assembly. 应用程序域是完全受信任的，因此这两个程序集都是完全受信任的。The application domain is fully trusted, so both assemblies are fully trusted. 该示例在沙盒应用程序域中创建另一个 `Worker` 对象，并再次调用 `TestIsFullyTrusted` 方法。The example creates another `Worker` object in a sandboxed application domain and again calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method. 即使在部分受信任的应用程序域中，Mscorlib 也始终是受信任的，但该示例程序集是部分受信任的。Mscorlib is always trusted, even in a partially trusted application domain, but the example assembly is partially trusted. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前应用程序域是否拥有一个为加载到该应用程序域的所有程序集授予的权限集。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain has a set of permissions that is granted to all assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.

value.span: 如果当前应用程序域具有一组同构权限，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current application domain has a homogenous set of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回通过使用 方法重载创建的沙盒应用程序域 `true`。This property returns `true` for sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload. 沙盒应用程序域具有一组相同的权限;也就是说，对加载到应用程序域中的所有部分受信任的程序集授予相同的权限集。Sandboxed application domains have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域（可选）有一个从该权限集中免除的具有强名称的程序集的列表，而是使用完全信任级别运行。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust. 完全受信任的代码可以使用 属性来确定沙盒应用程序域的同源授权集。Fully trusted code can use the property to determine the homogenous grant set of a sandboxed application domain. 此属性还将为桌面应用程序的默认应用程序域返回 `true`，因为该应用程序域向所有程序集授予完全信任。This property also returns `true` for the default application domain of a desktop application, because that application domain grants full trust to all assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，使用此方法加载的程序集的信任级别与应用程序域的信任级别相同。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain. 此方法只应用于将程序集加载到当前应用程序域中。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 提供此方法是为了为无法调用静态 方法的互操作性调用方提供便利。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，请使用诸如 的方法。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 有关此方法的所有重载所共有的信息，请参阅 方法重载。For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何加载原始程序集。The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/CPP/loadraw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/CS/loadraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/VB/loadraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只应用于将程序集加载到当前应用程序域中。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 提供此方法是为了为无法调用静态 方法的互操作性调用方提供便利。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，请使用诸如 的方法。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 如果已加载请求的程序集的版本，则即使请求了不同的版本，此方法也会返回已加载的程序集。If a version of the requested assembly is already loaded, this method returns the loaded assembly, even if a different version is requested. 不建议为 `assemblyRef` 提供部分程序集名称。Supplying a partial assembly name for `assemblyRef` is not recommended. （部分名称省略了一个或多个区域性、版本或公钥标记。(A partial name omits one or more of culture, version, or public key token. 对于采用字符串而不是 对象的重载，"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0" 是部分名称的示例，"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0，Culture = 中立，PublicKeyToken = 18ab3442da84b47" 是全名的示例。）使用部分名称会对性能产生负面影响。For overloads that take a string instead of an object, "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0" is an example of a partial name and "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=18ab3442da84b47" is an example of a full name.) Using partial names has a negative effect on performance. 此外，仅当应用程序基目录中存在程序集的精确副本（ 或 ）时，部分程序集名称才可以从全局程序集缓存加载程序集。In addition, a partial assembly name can load an assembly from the global assembly cache only if there is an exact copy of the assembly in the application base directory ( or ). 如果当前 对象表示应用程序域 `A`，而 方法是从应用程序域 `B`调用的，则该程序集将加载到这两个应用程序域中。If the current object represents application domain `A`, and the method is called from application domain `B`, the assembly is loaded into both application domains. 例如，下面的代码将 `MyAssembly` 加载到新应用程序域 `ChildDomain` 中，同时加载到代码执行的应用程序域中：For example, the following code loads `MyAssembly` into the new application domain `ChildDomain` and also into the application domain where the code executes: [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/vb/source.vb#1)] 程序集将加载到这两个域中，因为 不从 派生，因此无法封送 方法的返回值。The assembly is loaded into both domains because does not derive from , and therefore the return value of the method cannot be marshaled. 相反，公共语言运行时尝试将程序集加载到调用应用程序域中。Instead, the common language runtime tries to load the assembly into the calling application domain. 如果两个应用程序域的路径设置不同，则加载到这两个应用程序域中的程序集可能会有所不同。The assemblies that are loaded into the two application domains might be different if the path settings for the two application domains are different. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 属性和 属性，则第一次尝试加载程序集时将使用显示名称（包括版本、区域性等，如 属性返回）。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到该文件，则使用 属性来搜索该程序集。If the file is not found, the property is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用 找到程序集，则会将显示名称与程序集匹配。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，则会引发 。If the match fails, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `static` 属性（Visual Basic 中`Shared` 属性）控制进程中所有应用程序域的 CPU 和内存监视。This `static` property (`Shared` property in Visual Basic) controls CPU and memory monitoring of all the application domains in the process. 如果尝试将此属性设置为 `false`，则会引发 异常，即使属性的当前值 `false`也是如此。If you attempt to set this property to `false`, a exception is thrown, even if the current value of the property is `false`. 启用监视后，可以使用 、、和 实例属性来监视单个应用程序域的 CPU 和内存使用情况。Once monitoring is enabled, you can use the , , , and instance properties to monitor CPU and memory use of individual application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次垃圾回收都会更新统计信息。The statistics are updated with each garbage collection. 但是，它们只能在完全的阻止性收集后保证准确;即，包含所有代并在收集过程中停止应用程序的集合。However, they are guaranteed to be accurate only after a full, blocking collection; that is, a collection that includes all generations and that stops the application while collection occurs. 例如， 方法重载执行完整的阻塞式收集。For example, the method overload performs a full, blocking collection. （并发收集在后台发生，不会阻止应用程序。）(Concurrent collection occurs in the background and does not block the application.)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为应用程序域报告的总时间包括进程中每个线程在该应用程序域中执行的时间。The total time that is reported for an application domain includes the time each thread in the process spent executing in that application domain. 调用到非托管代码的线程仍与某个应用程序域相关联，并且为进行调用的应用程序域报告执行非托管代码所用的处理器时间。A thread that calls into unmanaged code is still associated with an application domain, and the processor time spent executing the unmanaged code is reported for the application domain where the call was made. 当线程被阻止或处于休眠状态时，它不会消耗处理器时间。When a thread is blocked or sleeping, it does not consume processor time.

summary.span: 获取沙盒应用程序域的权限集。

span.span: Gets the permission set of a sandboxed application domain.

value.span: 沙盒应用程序域的权限集。

span.span: The permission set of the sandboxed application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法重载创建的沙盒应用程序域具有一组相同的权限;也就是说，对加载到应用程序域中的所有部分受信任的程序集授予相同的权限集。Sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域（可选）有一个从该权限集中免除的具有强名称的程序集的列表，而是使用完全信任级别运行。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.

summary.span: 当默认应用程序域的父进程存在时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the default application domain's parent process exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的 可以在进程结束前执行终止活动，例如关闭文件、释放存储等。The for this event can perform termination activities, such as closing files, releasing storage and so on, before the process ends. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，将在注册事件处理程序的每个应用程序域中引发此事件。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this event is raised in each application domain that registers an event handler. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 中，所有 事件处理程序的总执行时间都受到限制，就像所有终结器的总执行时间在进程关闭时受到限制。In .NET Framework, the total execution time of all event handlers is limited, just as the total execution time of all finalizers is limited at process shutdown. 默认值为两秒。The default is two seconds. 非托管主机可以通过将[ICLRPolicyManager：： SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md)方法与[OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md)枚举值一起调用来更改此执行时间。An unmanaged host can change this execution time by calling the [ICLRPolicyManager::SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md) method with the [OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md) enumeration value. 此时间限制在 .NET Core 中不存在。This time limit does not exist in .NET Core. 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，仅当在默认应用程序域中注册了事件处理程序时，才会引发此事件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event is raised only in the default application domain, and only if an event handler is registered in the default application domain. 若要为此事件注册事件处理程序，你必须具有所需的权限，或者引发 。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 当程序集的解析在仅限反射的上下文中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在仅反射上下文中，不会自动解析依赖项。In the reflection-only context, dependencies are not resolved automatically. 此事件的处理程序必须预加载或返回这些事件。They must be preloaded or returned by the handler for this event. 当程序集具有尚未加载到仅反射上下文中的依赖项时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when an assembly has a dependency that is not already loaded into the reflection-only context. 缺少的依赖项由 属性指定。The missing dependency is specified by the property. 此事件的 必须返回满足依赖项的程序集。The for this event must return an assembly that satisfies the dependency. 返回的程序集必须加载到仅反射上下文中。The assembly that is returned must be loaded into the reflection-only context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅当要加载到仅反射上下文中的程序集的缺失依赖项（例如，通过使用 方法）引发此事件。This event is raised only for missing dependencies of the assembly that you are loading into the reflection-only context (for example, by using the method). 如果找不到正在加载的程序集，则不会引发此方法。It is not raised if the assembly that you are loading cannot be found. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始， 属性返回请求未能解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 如果有多个可用版本，知道发出请求的程序集的标识可能会很有用。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in identifying the correct version of the dependency, if more than one version is available. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 对于此事件， 属性在应用策略之前返回程序集名称。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
