summary.span: 当资源解析因资源不是程序集中的有效链接资源或嵌入资源而失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a resource fails because the resource is not a valid linked or embedded resource in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的 可以尝试查找包含该资源的程序集并返回它。The for this event can attempt to locate the assembly containing the resource and return it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果解析失败，则不会引发此事件，因为找不到有效链接资源的文件。This event is not raised if resolution fails because no file can be found for a valid linked resource. 如果找不到清单资源流，则会引发该方法，但如果找不到单个资源键，则不会引发此情况。It is raised if a manifest resource stream cannot be found, but it is not raised if an individual resource key cannot be found. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始， 属性包含请求资源的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the resource. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 若要为此事件注册事件处理程序，你必须具有所需的权限，或者引发 。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法插入项，或修改名称数据对的内部缓存中的项的值，这些名称数据对描述 的此实例的属性。Use this method to insert an entry, or modify the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 缓存自动包含创建应用程序域时插入的预定义系统条目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 不能用此方法插入或修改系统项。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 尝试修改系统条目的方法调用不起任何作用;方法不会引发异常。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 您可以用 方法检查系统项的值，或 中所述的等效 属性。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method, or the equivalent properties described in . 您可以调用此方法来设置默认超时间隔的值，以便通过将 "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" 作为 `name` 参数的值并将一个表示超时间隔的 值作为 `data` 参数的值来计算正则表达式模式。You can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 还可以通过此方法插入或修改自己的用户定义的名称数据对，并通过 方法检查其值。You can also insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with this method and inspect their values with the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来创建新的值对。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a new value pair. 然后，该示例使用 方法检索该值，并将其显示在控制台中。The example then uses the method to retrieve the value, and displays it to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可在描述应用程序域属性的名称/数据对的内部缓存中插入或修改自己的用户定义条目。Use this method to insert or modify your own user-defined entries in an internal cache of name/data pairs that describe properties of the application domain. 插入项时，可以指定在检索项时要强制执行的权限请求。此外，您可以调用此方法来设置默认超时间隔的值，以便通过提供 "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" 作为 `name` 参数的值，并将一个表示超时间隔的 值作为 `data` 参数的值来计算正则表达式模式。When you insert an entry, you can specify a permission demand to enforce when the entry is retrieved.In addition, you can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 不能使用此方法向系统定义的属性字符串分配安全要求。You cannot use this method to assign a security demand to a system-defined property string. 缓存自动包含创建应用程序域时插入的预定义系统条目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 不能用此方法插入或修改系统项。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 尝试修改系统条目的方法调用不起任何作用;方法不会引发异常。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 可以用 方法或 方法的 "备注" 部分中所述的等效 属性检查系统项的值。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method or the equivalent properties described in the Remarks section for the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，卷影副本包含通过探测找到的所有程序集。By default, a shadow copy includes all assemblies found through probing. 方法将卷影副本限制为 `path`指定的目录中的程序集。The method restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by `path`. 方法不指定要在其中搜索程序集的其他目录。The method does not specify additional directories to be searched for assemblies. 要进行卷影复制的程序集必须已位于搜索路径中，例如 下。Assemblies to be shadow-copied must already be located in the search path, for example under . 方法指定哪些搜索路径有资格被影像复制。The method specifies which search paths are eligible to be shadow-copied. 此方法设置与此实例关联的内部 的 属性。This method sets the property of the internal associated with this instance. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). ## Examples 此方法现已过时，不应用于新的开发。This method is now obsolete, and should not be used for new development. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当公共语言运行时无法确定可创建请求类型的程序集时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when the common language runtime is unable to determine the assembly that can create the requested type. 如果类型是在动态程序集中定义的，或者该类型未在动态程序集中定义，但运行时不知道在哪个程序集中定义了该类型，则可能会发生这种情况。This can occur if the type is defined in a dynamic assembly, or the type is not defined in a dynamic assembly but the runtime does not know which assembly the type is defined in. 如果使用未用程序集名称限定的类型名称调用 ，则可能出现后一种情况。The latter situation can occur when is called with a type name that is not qualified with the assembly name. 此事件的 可以尝试查找和创建类型。The for this event can attempt to locate and create the type. 但是，如果运行时知道在某些程序集中找不到类型，则不会发生 事件。However, the event does not occur if the runtime knows it is not possible to find a type in certain assemblies. 例如，如果在静态程序集中找不到该类型，则不会发生此事件，因为运行时知道类型不能动态添加到静态程序集。For example, this event does not occur if the type is not found in a static assembly because the runtime knows types cannot be added dynamically to static assemblies. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始， 属性包含请求该类型的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 若要为此事件注册事件处理程序，你必须具有所需的权限，或者引发 。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CPP/typeresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CS/typeresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/VB/typeresolve.vb#1)]

.event class System.UnhandledExceptionEventHandler UnhandledException

public: virtual event UnhandledExceptionEventHandler ^ UnhandledException;

summary.span: 当某个异常未被捕获时出现。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is not caught.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件提供未捕获的异常的通知。This event provides notification of uncaught exceptions. 它允许应用程序在系统默认处理程序向用户报告异常并终止应用程序之前记录有关异常的信息。It allows the application to log information about the exception before the system default handler reports the exception to the user and terminates the application. 如果提供了有关应用程序状态的足够信息，则可以执行其他操作，例如保存程序数据以便以后恢复。If sufficient information about the state of the application is available, other actions may be undertaken - such as saving program data for later recovery. 建议注意，因为在未处理异常时，程序数据可能会损坏。Caution is advised, because program data can become corrupted when exceptions are not handled. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，将在引发此事件之前向用户报告应用程序终止和调试选项，而不是在之后发出。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, application termination and debugging options are reported to the user before this event is raised, rather than after. 可以在任何应用程序域中处理此事件。This event can be handled in any application domain. 但是，在发生异常的应用程序域中不一定会引发该事件。However, the event is not necessarily raised in the application domain where the exception occurred. 仅当在未查找适用的异常处理程序的情况下展开了线程的整个堆栈后，才会处理异常，因此可以引发事件的第一个位置是该线程源自的应用程序域。An exception is unhandled only if the entire stack for the thread has been unwound without finding an applicable exception handler, so the first place the event can be raised is in the application domain where the thread originated. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，此事件仅发生在启动应用程序时由系统创建的默认应用程序域中。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event occurs only for the default application domain that is created by the system when an application is started. 如果应用程序创建了其他应用程序域，则在那些应用程序域中为此事件指定委托不起作用。If an application creates additional application domains, specifying a delegate for this event in those applications domains has no effect. 如果在默认应用程序域中处理 事件，则无论线程在哪个应用程序域中启动，都将为任何线程中的任何未经处理的异常引发此事件。If the event is handled in the default application domain, it is raised there for any unhandled exception in any thread, no matter what application domain the thread started in. 如果线程在具有 的事件处理程序的应用程序域中启动，则会在该应用程序域中引发该事件。If the thread started in an application domain that has an event handler for , the event is raised in that application domain. 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，并且在默认应用程序域中也有一个事件处理程序，则在这两个应用程序域中都会引发该事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, and there is also an event handler in the default application domain, the event is raised in both application domains. 例如，假设某个线程在应用程序域 "AD1" 中启动，调用应用程序域 "AD2" 中的方法，并在其中调用应用程序域 "AD3" 中的方法，该方法将引发异常。For example, suppose a thread starts in application domain "AD1", calls a method in application domain "AD2", and from there calls a method in application domain "AD3", where it throws an exception. 可在其中引发 事件的第一个应用程序域为 "AD1"。The first application domain in which the event can be raised is "AD1". 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，则还可以在默认应用程序域中引发该事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, the event can also be raised in the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 当 事件的事件处理程序正在执行时，公共语言运行时挂起线程中止。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while event handlers for the event are executing. 如果事件处理程序具有带有相应标志的 属性，则事件处理程序将被视为受约束的执行区域。If the event handler has a attribute with the appropriate flags, the event handler is treated as a constrained execution region. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，对于损坏进程状态（如堆栈溢出或访问冲突）的异常，不会引发此事件，除非事件处理程序是安全关键的并且具有 属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this event is not raised for exceptions that corrupt the state of the process, such as stack overflows or access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，在主应用程序线程之外的其他线程中发生的未经处理的异常将由运行时捕获，因此不会导致应用程序终止。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an unhandled exception that occurs in a thread other than the main application thread is caught by the runtime and therefore does not cause the application to terminate. 因此，无需终止应用程序即可引发 事件。Thus, it is possible for the event to be raised without the application terminating. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，已删除子线程中未经处理的异常的此项支撑，因为此类无提示故障的累积影响包括性能下降、损坏的数据和锁定，所有这些操作都难以debug.exe.Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this backstop for unhandled exceptions in child threads was removed, because the cumulative effect of such silent failures included performance degradation, corrupted data, and lockups, all of which were difficult to debug. 有关详细信息，包括运行时未终止的事例的列表，请参阅[托管线程中的异常](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, including a list of cases in which the runtime does not terminate, see [Exceptions in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md). 若要为此事件注册事件处理程序，你必须具有所需的权限，或者引发 。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## 未经处理的异常的其他事件Other Events for Unhandled Exceptions 对于某些应用程序模型，如果主应用程序线程中出现未经处理的异常，则其他事件可以抢占 事件。For certain application models, the event can be preempted by other events if the unhandled exception occurs in the main application thread. 在使用 Windows 窗体的应用程序中，主应用程序线程中的未处理异常将导致引发 事件。In applications that use Windows Forms, unhandled exceptions in the main application thread cause the event to be raised. 如果处理此事件，则默认行为是未经处理的异常不会终止应用程序，但应用程序仍处于未知状态。If this event is handled, the default behavior is that the unhandled exception does not terminate the application, although the application is left in an unknown state. 在这种情况下，不会引发 事件。In that case, the event is not raised. 此行为可以通过使用应用程序配置文件进行更改，也可以通过使用 方法将模式更改为在 事件处理程序挂钩之前 。This behavior can be changed by using the application configuration file, or by using the method to change the mode to before the event handler is hooked up. 这仅适用于主应用程序线程。This applies only to the main application thread. 对于其他线程中引发的未经处理的异常，会引发 事件。The event is raised for unhandled exceptions thrown in other threads. 从 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 开始，Visual Basic 应用程序框架为主应用程序线程中的未处理异常提供另一个事件。Starting with Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, the Visual Basic application framework provides another event for unhandled exceptions in the main application thread. 请参阅 事件。See the event. 此事件具有与 使用的事件参数对象同名的事件参数对象，但具有不同的属性。This event has an event arguments object with the same name as the event arguments object used by , but with different properties. 特别是，此事件参数对象有一个 属性，该属性允许应用程序继续运行，忽略未经处理的异常（并使应用程序处于未知状态）。In particular, this event arguments object has an property that allows the application to continue running, ignoring the unhandled exception (and leaving the application in an unknown state). 在这种情况下，不会引发 事件。In that case, the event is not raised. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 事件。The following example demonstrates the event. 它定义了一个在默认应用程序域中引发未经处理的异常时调用的事件处理程序 `MyHandler`。It defines an event handler, `MyHandler`, that is invoked whenever an unhandled exception is thrown in the default application domain. 然后，它将引发两个异常。It then throws two exceptions. 第一个由**try/catch**块处理。The first is handled by a **try/catch** block. 第二个未处理，将在应用程序终止前调用 `MyHandle` 例程。The second is unhandled and invokes the `MyHandle` routine before the application terminates. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CPP/unhandledexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CS/unhandledexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/VB/unhandledexception.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Unload (AppDomain domain);
.method public static hidebysig void Unload(class System.AppDomain domain) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Unload (domain As AppDomain)
public: static void Unload(AppDomain ^ domain);
static member Unload : AppDomain -> unit

param.name: domain
param.span: 要卸载的应用程序域。

span.span: An application domain to unload.

summary.span: 卸载指定的应用程序域。

span.span: Unloads the specified application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，有一个专用于卸载应用程序域的线程。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 there is a thread dedicated to unloading application domains. 这提高了可靠性，尤其是在承载 .NET Framework 时。This improves reliability, especially when the .NET Framework is hosted. 当线程调用 时，目标域将标记为要卸载。When a thread calls , the target domain is marked for unloading. 专用线程尝试卸载域，并中止域中的所有线程。The dedicated thread attempts to unload the domain, and all threads in the domain are aborted. 例如，如果某个线程不会中止，例如因为它正在执行非托管代码，或者因为它正在执行 `finally` 块，则在一段时间后，将在最初称为 的线程中引发 。If a thread does not abort, for example because it is executing unmanaged code, or because it is executing a `finally` block, then after a period of time a is thrown in the thread that originally called . 如果最终无法中止的线程结束，则不会卸载目标域。If the thread that could not be aborted eventually ends, the target domain is not unloaded. 因此，不能保证在 .NET Framework 版本 2.0 `domain` 中卸载，因为它可能无法终止执行线程。Thus, in the .NET Framework version 2.0 `domain` is not guaranteed to unload, because it might not be possible to terminate executing threads. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情况下，调用 会导致立即 ，例如，在终结器中调用它。In some cases, calling causes an immediate , for example if it is called in a finalizer. `domain` 中的线程使用 方法终止，该方法将引发线程中的 。The threads in `domain` are terminated using the method, which throws a in the thread. 尽管线程应立即终止，但它可以在 `finally` 子句中继续执行的时间量不能超出预期。Although the thread should terminate promptly, it can continue executing for an unpredictable amount of time in a `finally` clause. ## 版本兼容性Version Compatibility 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，如果调用 的线程正在 `domain`中运行，则将启动另一个线程来执行卸载操作。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 if the thread that calls is running in `domain`, another thread is started to perform the unload operation. 如果无法卸载 `domain`，则将在该线程中引发 ，而不会在调用 的原始线程中引发。If `domain` cannot be unloaded, a is thrown in that thread, not in the original thread that called . 但是，如果调用 的线程在 `domain`外运行，则该线程将收到异常。However, if the thread that calls is running outside `domain`, that thread receives the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何卸载应用程序域。The following code example shows how to unload an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]
